content:
Parishuddhanmaarkkaayu kaakka-
Ppedumudyaanam-pookaayvaanenne
/tveli-kkoppam nerkkunnen
/tkadamo-rtthundu bhayam naathhaa!
Narakattheennenneyetti
Paarppikkuka nin-hithamotthaa dikkil.

Rakshakaneshu mahaaraajaa!
sthuthi cheyyunnen-anuthaapakkaar mun
/tnin vaa-thil thuranneedunnu
/tellaa-nanmayumekum nin-
Nantuniyaavaanenne nin-
Nalvarameki-santoshippikka.

1. Dushdanmaaril kaa-runyam poondone!
Kaarunyam cheyu nin-nyaaya-ttheerppin naall.

2. Duഃkham poondor nin-vaathil muttunnu
Kaarunyatthaal nal-kenam yaachanaye

4. Vinnavar than naathhaa!- manmayaraashayume!
Kaikkondikkarmmam-kaarunyam cheyka.

items.content:
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Kaikkondadiyaarude karmmam
Poruthi ayacharullaname nin
Arayeennalivumanugrahavum.

Nidra vedinyittunarvvodu nyaan
Nin mun nilkkaaraakaname.
Veendumurangilathil paapam
Theendukayum cheyyaruthe nyaan.

Akramamunarvvil cheykil nyaan
Pokkaname naathhaa! Krpayaal
Nidrayil nyaan pizha cheythengkil
Nin krpa mochanamarullaname.

Ellimayezhum nin kurishineyor-
Tthekanamadiyanu sukhanidra
Maayaaroopakkaazhchakallil
Paayaathenne rakshikka.

Svachchhandamurangunneram
Dushchintakall dushdanmaarum
Enne vannu bharikkaayvaan
Ee raavil kaakkanamenne.

En dehamashesham kaappaan
Ekuka vellivin doothane nee.
Nin meyu nyaan bhakshichathinaal
Durmmohe veezharuthe nyaan.

Aashvaasatthodurangumeni-
Kkaavuka nin raktham kaaval
Ee nin sadrshamathaam srshdi-
Kkekaname nin svaathantyam.

Nin kaivelayathaam meynmel
Ninte valamkai mevaname
Parichaykkoppam kaakkuka
Nin-karunakkotta vallanyenne.

Meyyithurangumpoll kaaval
Cheyyaname ninnude shakthi
Elkkaname nal dhoopam pol
Enteyurakkam thirumumpil.

Nin maathrpraarththhanayaalen
Shayyaykkanayaruthe dushdan
Saatthaan himsikkaathenne nin
Baliyavane vilakkaname.

Nin vaakkennil nivartthikka
Nin kurishennuyir kaatthiduka
Enne thaangiya ninnanpaal
ninne unarvvil sthuthi cheyaan

Ninnishdam kettathine nyaan
Anuvartthippaan kartthaave!
Neethiyezhunnoru raavumeni-
Kkekaname nal sandhyayathum.

Vellivaam mashihaa rakshakaa nin
Velliviltthanne nin vaasam
Vellivin puthranmaar ninne-
Tthanne vandicheedunnu.

/tvellivil vasikkunnulakatthin
/trakshakanaameesho sthothram.
/tihaparalokangallil ninte
/tkrpa nyangallilundaakaname.

Sthothram sthothram kartthaave!
Sthothramathaayiramaayiramaayu
Anavadhiyaayu sthothram naathhaa!
Krpa venam nyangallilennum.

/tsthothram! Maalaakhakall shushroo-
/tshicheerayar vandippavane!
/tpraarththhana kellkkeerayarudeyum
/tmaalaakhakalludeyum naathhaa!

Thrithvekathvavumekathva-
Thrithvavumaayi sthhithi cheyyum
Pithrsutha parishuddhaathmaavaam
Sathyekaparannaayu sthothram.

/tbalaheena janapraarththhanaye
/tkellpponum kaazhchakall pole
/tanuthaapam poondor kanneer
/tkaikkollllunnavanum sthothram.

Eerayar shushrooshippone!
Maalaakhakall vaazhtthunnone!
Vrkshadala'tthin samkhyayil man-
Mayar ninne sthuthi cheyyunnu.

/tpithrsuthaparishuddhaathmakanaam
/tsathyekaparannaayu sthothram
/tcheytheedenam naam sathya-
/tjnyaanavivekatthodu koodi.

Mrthikara vishamaam pon velllli
Dhanamayyo nedaruthe nee
Theduka sukhakaramupadesham
Ninne naathhan snehippaan.

/tnaalpathu nompathu nokkuka nee
/t theettuka theenillaatthavare
/teeshaayisuthanoppam nee
/tpraarththhikkuka dinamezhoozham.

Naalpathu naallinnupavaasam
Moosha kazhicheleeyaayum,
naathhan shathruvine vennu
Naalpathu naallupavaasatthaal.

/tkadal kuzhi agnichoollakallil
/tninnu kareriya praarththhanakall
/tadiyaarude praarththhanakallkkum
/tkrpayaal vaathil thurakkaname.

Praarththhana ketteedunnavane!
Yaachana nalkeedunnavane!
praarththhana kettu nirappaayi
Krpayaal yaachana nalkaname.

content: /T(pattakkaarundengkil thudarnnu dhoopapraarththhanakall nadatthunnu. Illaatthapaksham kuriyelaayistton .. Kuri.. Kuri.. Nyangallude kartthaave! Nyangalludemel anugraham cheyyunname ennathum kartthu praarththhanayum cholli avasaanippikkunnu.)
